page.title: 17HUNSINGORE & WALSHFORD
page.content: There are few people in our area.Most people live in{Hunsingore but some live in{Walshford.}Most of the people in the area have lived in the country for all of their lives.A lot of jobs in{Hunsingore}and {Walshford}are to do with farming.The church is in the centre of the village and its spire can be seen from miles away because it is on a hill.The vicar no longer lives in the village.There used to be a clock on the church which was built by{William Potts,}but it was moved on to a farm building at{Clock {Farm,}which is owned by{Patrick Dent.} There is a{village hall,}part of it is over 200 years old. Discos,dances, parties and meetings are held there.People come across the river from Cowthorpe to school in{Hunsingore There were a lot of empty houses in the area,but these are being filled.
